name: Super Tank Fight
description:
Super Tank Fight is a 2-4 player tank fighting game where players attempt to eliminate one another's tanks, using destructible cover and interactible tiles to take out the competition. With simple mechanics, unique levels, and tons of tank/modifier combinations, Super Tank Fight is easy to pick up while providing plenty of room for mastery.

Now, go shoot your friends with pixelated bullets!

(Note: Audio is not currently working in the WebGL build)
